enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Crispin d`Auvergne (Saint Lucia) reported on the group`s discussions, which focused on the development of an information clearing house and workshops.
Chair Stoycheva introduced draft conclusions and a draft decision (FCCC/SBI/2004/L.16 and Add.1).
Parties adopted the conclusions and forwarded the draft decision to the COP.
